widgets.widgetText: Overview of all connected cloud accounts, including account status, ownership, and activity metrics.
Risk evaluation of cloud accounts highlighting security posture, compliance gaps, and potential vulnerabilities.
Summarizes recent security incidents and their resolutions.
Tracks new user sign-ups and overall growth trends.
Displays where visitors originate (e.g., search, social, direct).
Monitors server availability, uptime percentage, and downtime events.
Provides a summary of recent errors and system failures.
